<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Request an Account Movements"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/account/movement/async"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This method calls the process to cache account movements.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for AccountMovementAsyncRequest","description":"","required":["accountId","targetDate"],"type":"object","properties":{"accountId":{"description":"Accounts unique identifier.","type":"string"},"targetDate":{"format":"date-time","description":"Date of the event of the search","type":"string"},"startHour":{"description":"Start time of the search interval. Between [00-23].\nBy default, the start of the day is used.","type":"string"},"endHour":{"description":"End time of the search interval. Between [00-23].\nBy default, the end of the day is used.","type":"string"}},"example":{"accountId":"cb147d9d-fbe6-446b-8876-73519efd29f5","targetDate":"2024-03-01","startHour":"19","endHour":"20"}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
